title: Categorization of a Point in a Scatterplot
question_text:
Created for Albert.io. Copyright 2017. All rights reserved.
The scatterplot above shows age and shoe-size data that researchers collected on a random sample of students in a middle school.
How would the point ($19, 14$) be categorized?

choices.text: The point is an outlier but will not change the correlation.
The point is an outlier that is influential in changing the correlation.
The point is high-leverage but not an outlier.
The point is neither an outlier nor high-leverage.
